Deﬁnition 3.4 (Symmetric, Positive Deﬁnite Matrix). A symmetric matrix
A ∈ Rn×n that satisﬁes (3.11) is called symmetric, positive deﬁnite , orsymmetric, positive
deﬁnite just positive deﬁnite. If only ⩾holds in (3.11), then Ais called symmetric,
